desc: This course is an analytical study of Newtonian mechanics, including the harmonic oscillator, central force motion, non-linear oscillators, chaos and an introduction to the Lagrangian formulation. Students use computers extensively. Prerequisites: Physics 127, Mathematics 230, and concurrent registration in Physics 384. Offered Fall Semester.
name: Classical Mechanics
prerequisites: Prerequisites: Physics 127, Mathematics 230, and concurrent registration in Physics 384. Offered Fall Semester.
